Reviews.Title: like it and complaint the case
Reviews.Author: miaotan999
Reviews.Content: Camera is so good!I like it so much!But it's case is so tight to place it in,and the case has bad quality!

ProductInfo.Features:
Bright 3-inch LCD with 922,000 dots enables easy viewing
12.1 megapixel high-sensitivity CMOS sensor
DIGIC 5 image processor
5x optical zoom (28mm-140mm)
Capture stunning 1080p Full HD video in stereo sound with a dedicated movie button
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot G15 12.1 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom + NB-10L Battery + 9pc Bundle 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
